items.name: ALWAYS
lines: The element can be restarted at any time.

items.name: DEFAULT
lines: The restart behavior for the element is determined by the value of the XTiming.RestartDefault attribute.
This is the default value for the XTiming.Restart attribute.

items.name: INHERIT
lines: Specifies that the value of this attribute (and of the restart behavior) are inherited from the XTiming.RestartDefault value of the parent element.
If there is no parent element, the value is AnimationRestart.ALWAYS. This is the default value for the XTiming.RestartDefault attribute.

items.name: NEVER
lines: The element cannot be restarted for the remainder of the current simple duration of the parent time container.

items.name: WHEN_NOT_ACTIVE
lines: The element can only be restarted when it is not active (i.e.
it can be restarted after the active end). Attempts to restart the element during its active duration are ignored.
